titles.title: Funeral Honors for World War II Veterans Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense to provide seven person firing parties in the funeral honors details for World War II veterans.
Funeral Honors for World War II Veterans Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: Funeral Honors for World War II Veterans Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Defense (DOD) to include seven person firing parties in the funeral honors details for World War II veterans.
